meanings.definition: The area of land immediately surrounding a house or dwelling, typically enclosed by a fence or wall.
meanings.sent1: The curtilage of the house was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Children were playing in the curtilage of the property.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat explored every corner of the curtilage.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the curtilage, bringing life to the quiet space.
meanings.sent5: The sun set behind the curtilage, casting a warm glow over the area.

meanings.definition: The grounds or yard of a property.
meanings.sent1: We had a picnic in the curtilage of the estate.
meanings.sent2: The curtilage was well-maintained with trimmed hedges and a neat lawn.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the curtilage seemed to have a secret meeting every evening.
meanings.sent4: His dreams expanded beyond the curtilage, reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly cut grass wafted from the curtilage, inviting us to relax.
